name: Banterbury
description:
In Banterbury, you play as a lowly knight riding his way to the top by jousting your way through the valley to challenge the great knight that awaits you in the arena.

THIS GAME IS COMPATIBLE WITH: Steam VR connected to HTC Vive

This game was the result of my group's Virtual Reality final!  We hope you enjoy it!

Credits

Steve Glatfelter

Corran Nolan

Stefan Vo

Music

Yonder Hill and Dale by Aaron Kenny

Juniper by Kevin MacLeod

Black and White by Max Surla

Majestic Hills by Kevin MacLeod

Fonts

Fenwick Wood Type by Dieter Steffmann
